title: "Data visualization, reporting, and processing with R and the tidyverse"

This is the website for the _tidyverse_ workshop at the Jacobs Center on Dec 05-06, 2018.

## About

This website contains exercises, solutions, and slides for the two-day workshop.  The website and the associated resources will remain available after the workshop.
